title: Something that would really COMPLEMENT the new /REMAKE function
body:
**It would help players return to the game before any losses are incurred if Riot made _refreshing the client and the "Reconnect" button more accessible._**

I can't speak for everyone, but 95% of the games where I'm away for the first few minutes of the game, it's not because I have a really obvious computer/internet problem. I have an average computer and internet, but sometimes, they just decide to play up for that _**15 seconds**_ which completely screws up my loading into the game. It doesn't help that the loading screen doesn't always notify when the client has frozen or is unresponsive, but the main thing is once I've realized I have a problem, it takes so long to completely restart the client, login, and click on "reconnect".

Why can't there be a button on the loading screen which allows fast-paced exiting of the game client back to the matchmaking/chat with an option to reconnect without having to re-login (I doubt this is a security issue seeing as I haven't actively logged out, and it's still on the same computer/IP).

Thoughts?

replies.body:
I just press Alt+F4 on loading and it puts me back to the Reconnect button instantly.

Or is that when I quit while in game? Either way, Alt+F4 helps.
